## parseColorHexRGB() function

Converts a hexadecimal color string to a [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseColorHexRGB(raw: string): ColorRGBA64 | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  raw | string | a color string in the form of "\#RRGGBB" or "\#RGB" |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) \| null

## Example


```ts
parseColorHexRGBA("#FF0000");
parseColorHexRGBA("#F00");

```
